item.title: Hello World!
item.description: How I Created my Blog? I always wanted to have my own personal blog. I had explored different website building solutions like Weebly, Wix but the amount of freedom to do things with them are limited. Even I had started learning React.Js to build one from scratch but it was exhausting to do things. And finally, I found this framework called Hugo which lets you design and maintain websites by using simple Markdown language and supports large theme.
